data.description:
Grow your subscriber base and expand your paper route in this arcade inspired newspaper delivery game. 

CORE FEATURES

-Comfortable & Innovative bicycle locomotion
-Designed exclusively for VR
-Seated VR experience
-Powered by Unreal Engine 4
-More game modes and input options coming soon!

GAMEPLAY FEATURES

-Arcade inspired scoring and progression

-Traps including cars, dogs, tornadoes, grannies and more!

-Interactive Objects. Gain bonus points for smashing lawn gnomes, knocking over trashcans and breaking windows of non-subscribers!

-28 Rounds. Progress through 28 game days unless you lose all your subscribers before then! 

-Four neighborhood sections. Route expands into a new section each game week. 

-”Sunday Special Edition” At the end of each game week players collect coin pickups to pay for all the tossed papers while encountering boss fights with the rival paper. All while still keeping up with their daily deliveries!

changelog.change_log: Version 1.8 Update - game will now automatically continue to start of next round after the end of a current round if the user remains inactive in the menu for 10 seconds
Version 1.7 Update - corrected paper pickup in overtime mode, overtime mode should now show correct map at start of level and pause, dog now returns to its doghouse if nearby when you crash
Version 1.6 Update - adjusted some lawn mower positions, adjusted some spawn locations in section B and C, fixed downhill achievement not triggering properly

Version 1.5 Update - corrected end of week cash earnings calculation, added visual flash hit indication when player is hit during Sunday boss fight, plane crash will now properly pause during game pause, increased audio range of vehicle engine sound to give player more time to react to incoming cars, improved vehicle engine sound, updated manhole 3D mesh

Version 1.4 Update - bike now remains fully stationary until hands appear after a crash so player can prepare and get ready before moving again, added new run away lawn mower trap, keep an eye out for unlucky aircraft

Version 1.3 Update - Overtime high scores will now save to leaderboard properly, game will now pull stats from leaderboard after a re-install to restore stats and achievement progress, fixed rare instances where pause menu would not interact
Version 1.2 Hotfix - increased grab range for papers in basket, fixed bug with grabbing handlebar after crash, bike audio now starts playing properly after re-spawn from crash
